content: It seems to be a mistake on "Resource References" FHIR spec page: https://hl7.org/fhir/r4/references.html - highlighted text. "Condition" expected instead of "Procedure". Whom should I address this? Reference-page.png
If you go to the bottom of the page (should be on every FHIR spec page) there is a link to "Propose a change" (http://hl7.org/fhir-issues), which allows you to submit a Jira ticket for the problem.
